properties.entry:
Round 4-6 Instructions

The next {self.repeat} rounds are the same as the previous rounds with one exception - you will not be able to anonymously communicate with the other participants in your group. The length of these rounds is again {self.duration} seconds.

On the top right corner of the screen you can see how many tokens you have collected. On the top left corner of the screen you can see the amount of time remaining in the round.

If you have any questions please raise your hand. Do you have any questions so far?
